verses.verse: To The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ephesian <S%G2179><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Write : <S%G1125><s%> These Things <S%G3592><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Holds <S%G2902><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Stars <S%G792><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1188><s%> His Right Hand, <S%G846><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Walks <S%G4043><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Lampstands <S%G3087><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Golden. <S%G5552><s%>

I Know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> Thy Works, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Labour <S%G2873><s%> Thy, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Endurance <S%G5281><s%> , Thy, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Thou Canst Not <S%G1410><s%> Bear <S%G941><s%> Evil Ones; <S%G2556><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thou Didst Try <S%G3985><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Declare Themselves <S%G5335><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Are Not <S%G1526><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Didst Find <S%G2147><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Liars; <S%G5571><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Didst Bear <S%G941><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Endurance <S%G5281><s%> Hast, <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> For The Sake Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name <S%G3450><s%> Hast Laboured <S%G2872><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Hast Not Wearied : <S%G2577><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> I Have <S%G2192><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> Thee, <S%G4675><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G26><s%> Thy Love <S%G4675><s%> Thy <S%G3588><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Thou Didst Leave. <S%G863><s%>

Remember <S%G3421><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Whence <S%G4159><s%> , Thou Hast Fallen From, <S%G1601><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Repent, <S%G3340><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Do : <S%G4160><s%> <S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Not, <S%G3361><s%> I Am Coming <S%G2064><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> Quickly, <S%G5034><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Remove <S%G2795><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3087><s%> Thy Lampstand <S%G4675><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> Its, <S%G3588><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> Its <S%G846><s%> Except <S%G1437><s%> Thou <S%G3361><s%> Shouldest Repent. <S%G3340><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Thou Hast, <S%G2192><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Thou Hatest <S%G3404><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Nicolaitans, <S%G3531><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> I Also <S%G2504><s%> Hate. <S%G3404><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> An Ear, <S%G3775><s%> Let Him Hear <S%G191><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Assemblies. <S%G1577><s%> To Him That <S%G3588><s%> Overcomes, <S%G3528><s%> I Will Give <S%G1325><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> To Eat <S%G5315><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tree <S%G3586><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Midst <S%G3319><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Paradise <S%G3857><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Of Smyrneans <S%G4668><s%> Write : <S%G1125><s%> These Things <S%G3592><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> First <S%G4413><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Last, <S%G2078><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lived. <S%G2198><s%>

I Know <S%G1492><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tribulations <S%G2347><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Poverty; <S%G4432><s%> <S%G4145><s%> But Rich <S%G1161><s%> Thou Art; <S%G1488><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Calumny <S%G988><s%> Of Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Declare <S%G3004><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> To Be <S%G1511><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Are Not, <S%G1526><s%> But <S%G235><s%> A Synagogue <S%G4864><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Satan. <S%G4567><s%>

Not At All <S%G3367><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> The Things Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Are About <S%G3195><s%> To Suffer. <S%G3958><s%> , Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Is About <S%G3195><s%> To Cast Some <S%G906><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil <S%G1228><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Prison, <S%G5438><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Be Tried; <S%G3985><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Shall Have <S%G2192><s%> Tribulation <S%G2347><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Ten. <S%G1176><s%> Be Thou <S%G1096><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> Unto <S%G891><s%> Death, <S%G2288><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Give <S%G1325><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crown <S%G4735><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Life. <S%G2222><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> An Ear, <S%G3775><s%> Let Him Hear <S%G191><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Assemblies. <S%G1577><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Overcomes <S%G3528><s%> <S%G3756><s%> In No Wise <S%G3361><s%> Shall Be Injured <S%G91><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Second. <S%G1208><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Pergamos <S%G4010><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Write : <S%G1125><s%> These Things <S%G3592><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sword <S%G4501><s%> Two <S%G3588><s%> Edged <S%G1366><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sharp, <S%G3691><s%>

I Know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> , Thy Works <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> Thou Dwellest, <S%G2730><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Throne <S%G2362><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Satan Is <S%G4567><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thou Holdest Fast <S%G2902><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> My Name, <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Didst Deny <S%G720><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> My Faith <S%G3450><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Antipas <S%G493><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3144><s%> My Witness <S%G3450><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faithful Was, <S%G4103><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Was Killed <S%G615><s%> ' Among <S%G3844><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Dwells <S%G2730><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Satan. <S%G4567><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> I Have <S%G2192><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> A Few Things; <S%G3641><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Thou Hast <S%G2192><s%> There Those <S%G1563><s%> Holding <S%G2902><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Teaching <S%G1322><s%> Of Balaam, <S%G903><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1321><s%> Taught <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Balak <S%G904><s%> To Cast <S%G906><s%> A Snare <S%G4625><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> To Eat <S%G5315><s%> Things Sacrificed To Idols <S%G1494><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Commit Fornication. <S%G4203><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> Hast <S%G2192><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Thou Those <S%G4771><s%> Holding <S%G2902><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Teaching <S%G1322><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Nicolaitans, <S%G3531><s%> Which Thing <S%G3739><s%> I Hate. <S%G3404><s%>

Repent! <S%G3340><s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But If Not, <S%G3361><s%> I Am Coming <S%G2064><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> Quickly, <S%G5035><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Make War <S%G4170><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sword <S%G4501><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> Of My Mouth. <S%G3450><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> An Ear, <S%G3775><s%> Let Him Hear <S%G191><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Assemblies. <S%G1577><s%> To Him That <S%G3588><s%> Overcomes, <S%G3528><s%> I Will Give <S%G1325><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> To Eat <S%G5315><s%> Of <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Manna <S%G3131><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hidden; <S%G2928><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Give <S%G1325><s%> To Him A 846 P-DSM Pebble 5586 N-ASF White, 3022 A-ASF And 2532 CONJ On 1909 PREP The 3588 T-ASF Pebble 5586 N-ASF A Name 3686 N-NSN New 2537 A-NSN Written, 1125 V-RPP-ASN Which 3739 R-ASN No One 3762 A-NSM Knew 1097 V-2AAI-3S 1487 COND Except 3361 PRT-N He Who 3588 T-NSM Receives It. 2983 V-PAP-NSM

And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thyatira <S%G2363><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Write : <S%G1125><s%> These Things <S%G3592><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Eyes <S%G3788><s%> His <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Flame <S%G5395><s%> Of Fire, <S%G4442><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> His Feet <S%G846><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> Fine Brass. <S%G5474><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> I Have <S%G2192><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> A Few Things <S%G3641><s%> That Thou <S%G3754><s%> Sufferest <S%G1439><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Women <S%G1135><s%> , Jezebel, <S%G2403><s%> Her Who <S%G3588><s%> Calls <S%G3004><s%> Herself <S%G1438><s%> A Prophetess, <S%G4398><s%> To Teach <S%G1321><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Mislead <S%G4105><s%> My <S%G1699><s%> Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> To Commit Fornication <S%G4203><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Things Sacrificed To Idols <S%G1494><s%> To Eat. <S%G5315><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Gave <S%G1325><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> Time <S%G5550><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> She Might Repent <S%G3340><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4202><s%> Her Fornication; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> She Repented Not. <S%G3340><s%>

Lo, <S%G2400><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Cast 906 V-PAI-1S Her 846 P-ASF Into 1519 PREP A Bed, 2825 N-ASF And 2532 CONJ Those Who 3588 T-APM Commit Adultery 3431 V-PAP-APM ' With 3326 PREP Her 846 P-GSF Into 1519 PREP Tribulation 2347 N-ASF Great, 3173 A-ASF 1437 COND Except 3361 PRT-N They Should Repent 3340 V-AAS-3P Of 1537 PREP 3588 T-GPN Works 2041 N-GPN Their. 846 P-GPM

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5043><s%> Her Children <S%G846><s%> I Will Kill <S%G615><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Death; <S%G2288><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Know <S%G1097><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Assemblies <S%G1577><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Am 1510 V-PXI-1S He Who 3588 T-NSM Searches 2045 V-PAP-NSM Reins 3510 N-APM And 2532 CONJ Hearts; 2588 N-APF And 2532 CONJ I Will Give 1325 V-FAI-1S To You 5213 P-2DP Each 1538 A-DSM According 2596 PREP To 3588 T-APN Works 2041 N-APN Your. 5216 P-2GP

<S%G5213><s%> But To You <S%G1161><s%> I Say, <S%G3004><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The Rest <S%G3062><s%> Who Are <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thyatira, <S%G2363><s%> As Many As <S%G3745><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Have Not <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1322><s%> This Teaching, <S%G3778><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Knew Not <S%G1097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Depths <S%G899><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Satan, <S%G4567><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> They Say; <S%G3004><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> I Will Cast <S%G906><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Any Other <S%G243><s%> Burden; <S%G922><s%>
But <S%G4133><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Ye Have <S%G2192><s%> Holdfast <S%G2902><s%> Till <S%G891><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> I Shall Come. <S%G2240><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Overcomes, <S%G3528><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Keeps <S%G5083><s%> Until The <S%G891><s%> End <S%G5056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> My Works, <S%G3450><s%> I Will Give <S%G1325><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations, <S%G1484><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Shall Shepherd <S%G4165><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Rod <S%G4464><s%> An Iron, <S%G4603><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Vessels <S%G4632><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Pottery <S%G2764><s%> Are Broken In Pieces; <S%G4937><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> I Also <S%G2504><s%> Have Received <S%G2983><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> My Father; <S%G3450><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Give <S%G1325><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Star <S%G792><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Morning. <S%G4407><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> An Ear, <S%G3775><s%> Let Him Hear <S%G191><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Assemblies. <S%G1577><s%>
